markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Solid Fog](/Spells.aspx?ID=290)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 370 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deity**
[Hanspur](/Deities.aspx?ID=154)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure a bank of fog so thick it impedes movement as well as sight. This functions as [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), except that the area is also difficult terrain. You can Dismiss the spell.
name: Solid Fog

<summary>
Conjure heavy fog that obscures sight and is hard to move through.
</summary>
summary: Conjure heavy fog that obscures sight and is hard to move through.
summary_markdown: Conjure heavy fog that obscures sight and is hard to move through.
text: Solid Fog Source Core Rulebook pg. 370 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deity Hanspur Cast Three Actions material, somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 20-foot burst Duration 1 minute --- You conjure a bank of fog so thick it impedes movement as well as sight. This functions as obscuring mist , except that the area is also difficult terrain. You can Dismiss the spell.
